'''Falero''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Falero was a member of the ill-fated VTC expedition to [Poko Kohara](/pokoKohara/), obsessed with studying the murals, lore, and history of the place. Unfortunately, his fascination did not translate to caution and he was killed by an Engwithan Saint.

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|stronghold      =
|rest            =

|none            = 
}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Storms of Poko Kohara](/theStormsOfPokoKohara/): Falero is seen in three spirit visions, first outside when the expedition is attacked, next on level one where he blames [Dueno](/dueno/) for pushing [Olara](/olara/) into a spike trap, then on level two where he accuses [Beza](/beza/) after discovering her next to the body of Dueno.
:His [log](/pokoKoharaExpeditionLog/) can be found on the body of [Dueno](/dueno/), on level two.
